dialogue.introduction: Hello! Last of the Yuugumo-class, it's Kiyoshimo! I'm a bit late, but I'll be in your care!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Kiyoshimo, the 19th and last of the Yuugumo class destroyers. I was born in Uraga dontcha know. And goodness, what a horrible situation it was that I was born into too. I wasn't around for long but I took part in several fleet actions. Leyte was, of course, apalling to see but I even took part in Operation Rei-gou! How's that?
dialogue.secretary1: Hmhmmmm! Uraga born and bred. Great, isn't it?
dialogue.secretary2: Hey, aren't you glad it's Kiyoshimo?
dialogue.secretary3: Geez, Commander! ...Keep it a secret from my older sisters? Ok?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hey, Commander? What's that, what are you doing? Hey, watcha dooin? Tell me tell me tell meeeeeee?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander? You know, if you're tired, you can take a break with me? Right, right?
dialogue.wedding: Commander? What's wrong, you have such a serious look on your face? Eh, what's... this? This is for me? Really? Nn... thank you. I wonder... why... I'm starting to tear up.
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander? Want to see the message? Hm?
dialogue.equipment1: I wonder how many more remodels will it take for me to become a battleship...? Eh? O-of course I can!
dialogue.equipment2: How am I looking? Am I cool? Strong?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I wish I sortie with battleshi~ps!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'll be in the bath for sliiiightly longer. Yup.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Operation Rei-Gou? No? It's all good! Sortieing anyway!
dialogue.battle_start: I won't lose to Yuugumo-neesan or my other sisters!
dialogue.attack: I wonder how Musashi-san is doing? I've got to give it my best too!
dialogue.night_battle: A night deployment, huh... I ended up remembering that night.
dialogue.night_attack: I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
dialogue.mvp: Hmhmm, how's that? Now you've seen what I can really do. You want to go ahead and remodel me into a battleship now?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Hyaa!? It'll be the end if that hit on target!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Huh? The left side? Huh? Navigation is impossible? No way... That's... Really bad isn't it...?
dialogue.sunk: Am I... going to sink... again? It's fine... Everyone, go on ahead... Once you hit the enemy... come back, ok?

hourly.0000: 00000! Eh? Was there an extra 0? 0000-... H-huh? Huh? Huuuh?
hourly.0200: 0222! Wah, I messed up again. I'll get it this time! It's 0200!
hourly.0300: 03! ...00... I'm sleepy... This mission, is tough...
hourly.0400: 0400. I'm seriously sleepy right now! Won't someone take over already?!
hourly.0500: 0500! Eh? If I do this right, I'll become a battleship? Guh... I guess I'll do my best.
hourly.0700: 0700. Hey, Kiyoshimo's gonna try her best and make breakfast, ok?!
hourly.0800: 0800. How is breakfast? Let's eat our fill and turn into battleships together!
hourly.0900: 0900. Commander, we should go for morning training together. Let's go!
hourly.1000: 1000. Ugh... I ate too much for breakfast... And it feels bad after I've exercised... Uuu...
hourly.1100: I don't feel so good... 11..0..0... S-Somehow I managed to report the time. Guh...
hourly.1200: 1200. Commander, I'm sorry... Please go ahead with lunch by yourself... I can't do it.
hourly.1300: 1300. What did you have for lunch? Omurice with Yamato-nee-sama? H-how nice...
hourly.1400: 1400. Eh, Kasumi-chan? What's wrong, you're here because you're worried about me again?
hourly.1500: 1500. I got a riceball from Kasumi-chan because I didn't have lunch! Let's have it now. Mmm, this flavor of salt from the salted plum is great.
hourly.1600: 1600. Commander, this Kiyoshimo has mended her ways. Let's do it!
hourly.1700: 1700. Right, I should get to cleaning the office and prepare for outfitting!
hourly.1800: 1800. Commander? There's night battle training for the day? Of course! I'll join too!
hourly.1900: 1900. Right! For this part, I should use the star flare, star flares... Huh? I don't have one?
hourly.2000: 2000. Really, the members 2nd Torpedo Squadron were strong. How nice...
hourly.2100: 2100. Huh, Kasumi-chan? Another riceball? Is it ok to have it?
hourly.2200: 2200. Oh right, I was so engrossed in the night battle that I forgot about dinner. Commander, are you hungry? Shall we have dinner together?
hourly.2300: 2300. Ehh!? You had beef steak with Musashi-san? How nice... You should've invited me along too! That's not fair!
